name: stock_get_press_releases
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool webull.
Tool description: Query public data for investment products including stocks, fractional shares, options, ETFs, and ADRs as on webull.com
API description: Retrieves press releases for a given stock ticker.

tickerid.description: The value of tickerId field returned in other endpoints, such as .../stock/search or .../market/get-common-ranking or .../market/get-top-active or .../market/get-top-gainers or etc...

lastannouncementid.description: For paging purpose, the last announcement Id returned right in this endpoint, leave empty for the first query.

limit.description: For paging purpose, the number of items per response
